query:
SELECT 
  MONTH(dataVenda) as mes,
  COALESCE(SUM(valorTotal), 0) as totalBruto,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade
FROM vendas
WHERE YEAR(dataVenda) = 2025
  AND excluido = 0
GROUP BY MONTH(dataVenda)
ORDER BY MONTH(dataVenda)
